Non-essential code-generator IR related routines.

Imports

../ast/ast_types, ../ast/typesrenderer, cgir, ../utils/idioms, ../ast/ast

Procs

proc render(body: Body): string {....raises: [Exception, KeyError, ValueError],
                                  tags: [RootEffect].}
Renders body to human-readable code that tries to emulate the shape of the high-level language. The output is meant for debugging and tracing and is not guaranteed to have a stable format.   Source   Edit 
proc treeRepr(n: CgNode): string {....raises: [Exception, KeyError, ValueError],
                                   tags: [RootEffect].}
Renders the tree representation of n to text.   Source   Edit
